name: CLI
description:
A command-line based hacking game currently in development. There isn't much content for the game itself yet apart from a small easter-egg. Try finding it. 

HERE IS A LIST OF AVALIABLE COMMANDS:

HELP: SHOWS LIST OF COMMANDS
INFO: SHOWS INFORMATION ABOUT THE CONSOLE
COLOR: CHANGES CONSOLE TEXT COLOR
CLS: CLEARS THE CONSOLE
CONNECT: CONNECTS TO IP ADDRESS
DISCONNECT: DISCONNECTS FROM CURRENT CONNECTION
DIR: DISPLAYS LIST OF FILES IN CURRENT DIRECTORY
CD: CHANGES THE CURRENT DIRECTORY
IPCONFIG: DISPLAYS INTERNET INFORMATION
IPLIST: SCANS FOR NEARBY IP ADDRESSES
FILE: MANAGES ALL FILE OPERATIONS
BINARY DECODE: DECODES BINARY FROM FILE
BASE64 DECODE: DECODES BASE64 FROM FILE
VOLUME: SETS THE AUDIO VOLUME

TYPE 'HELP' FOLLOWED BY A COMMAND TO SEE MORE INFORMATION

IPLIST, CONNECT, DIR, CD and FILE are useful commands to get started with. They may help you in discovering that secret.

Linux and Mac builds have not been tested. Use at your own risk.
